Name: NVDIMM Diagnostic Message Registry
Description: This registry defines the messages for Diagnostics.

GoalConfigFailed.Resolution: Confirm goal config and try to apply again.

GoalConfigFailedApply.Description: The goal config failed to apply.
GoalConfigFailedApply.Message: A goal config failed to apply.
GoalConfigFailedApply.Resolution: Confirm goal config and try to apply again.

GoalConfigEmpty.Description: A goal config does not exist.
GoalConfigEmpty.Message: A goal config does not exist.

InvalidConfigSocket.Description: The goal config cannot be created with current settings.
InvalidConfigSocket.Message: All DIMMs on a socket must be configured at once.
InvalidConfigSocket.Resolution: Create a goal config to include all DIMMs on a socket.

GoalConfigUnknown.Description: Undefined error occurred applying the goal config.

DeviceBusy.Message: Device cannot be accessed at this time.
DeviceBusy.Resolution: Attempt access at a later time.

ComponentsNotPaired.Description: PMM and DDR4 missing on iMC.
ComponentsNotPaired.Message: PMM and DDR4 missing on iMC.
ComponentsNotPaired.Resolution: Add PMM and DDR4 to iMC.

UnsupportedSoftware.Description: Platform does not support PMM software.
UnsupportedSoftware.Message: Platform does not support PMM software.
UnsupportedSoftware.Resolution: Update PMM software to a supported version.

UnsupportedPersistMemMode.Description: Platform does not support persistent memory mode.
UnsupportedPersistMemMode.Message: Platform does not support persistent memory mode.

UnsupportedInterleaveSize.Description: Platform does not support specified interleave sizes.
UnsupportedInterleaveSize.Message: Platform does not support specified interleave sizes.

UnsupportedDefaultInterleaveSize.Description: Platform does not support default interleave sizes.
UnsupportedDefaultInterleaveSize.Message: Platform does not support default interleave sizes.

UnsupportedSkuConfig.Description: Config not supproted by current SKU.
UnsupportedSkuConfig.Message: Config not supproted by current SKU.

MappedMemReducedCpuSku.Description: Mapped memory reduced due to CPU SKU limit.
MappedMemReducedCpuSku.Message: Mapped memory reduced due to CPU SKU limit.

UnsupportedMixSku.Description: Operation not supported by mixed SKUs.
UnsupportedMixSku.Message: Operation not supported by mixed SKUs.
UnsupportedMixSku.Resolution: Confirm all DIMMs are of the same SKU.

RegionSzToSmall.Description: Region size too small for interleave set alignment.
RegionSzToSmall.Message: Region size too small for interleave set alignment.

ResvDimmError.Description: Reserve DIMM requires at least 2 DIMMs.
ResvDimmError.Message: Reserve DIMM requires at least 2 DIMMs.

PersistentMemAppliedToAll.Description: Persistent memory must be applied to all DIMMs.
PersistentMemAppliedToAll.Message: Persistent memory must be applied to all DIMMs.
PersistentMemAppliedToAll.Resolution: Apply persistent memory to all DIMMs

GoalConfigMismatchOnSocket.Description: Mismatch of allocated percentage on the socket.
GoalConfigMismatchOnSocket.Message: Mismatch of allocated percentage on the socket.
GoalConfigMismatchOnSocket.Resolution: Apply persistent memory to all DIMMs
